mapper.select: SELECT DAILY_REPORT_ID AS dailyReportId , MEMBER_ID AS memberId , RECENT_TREND_TITLE AS recentTrendTitle , RECENT_TREND_CONTENT AS recentTrendContent , STOCK_TREND_TITLE AS stockTrendTitle , STOCK_TREND_CONTENT AS stockTrendContent , KOSDAQ_PRICE AS kosdaqPrice , KOSDAQ_PROFIT_RATE AS kosdaqProfitRate , KOSPI_PRICE AS kospiPrice , KOSPI_PROFIT_RATE AS kospiProfitRate , DAILY_TREND_SUMMARIZED_TITLE AS dailyTrendSummarizedTitle , DAILY_TREND_SUMMARIZED_CONTENT AS dailyTrendSummarizedContent , CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM DAILY_REPORT WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND DATE_FORMAT(CREATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '%Y-%m-%d')
